name: Order Paid with Order - Items filter and {{ order.details }} placeholder
description: Payment confirmation email, triggered when order receives processing or completed status. It includes an optional filter to limit its usage to a specified product.

actions.subject_value: This is payment confirmation for order #{{ order.id }}
actions.heading_value: Your order #{{ order.id }} has been successfully paid
actions.message_text: Dear {{ customer.name }}, Thank you for your payment for order #{{ order.id }}. You can check the order details below: {{ order.details | plaintext: 'no' }} It will be shipped to the {{ order.shipping_address }},  {{ order.shipping_city }}. You will receive separate email once it will leave our warehouse. Thanks for shopping with us!
actions._action_title: Order Paid with Order - Items filter and order details placeholder
